nodes.text: The High Council Chamber, located within the Jedi Temple of Tython was built during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire following the Jedi Order's relocation to their ancestral homeworld. It was home to the Jedi High Council following the destruction of their original chamber during the Sacking of Coruscant. A large domed chamber located on the second story of the Jedi Temple, the High Council chamber contained a large circular table with ten chairs surrounding it. Large, wooden statues of Jedi Masters surrounded the table; a holoprojector was wired into the center of the table.
